name: Future War (itch)
description:
Future War is a prototype 2D Platformer-Action game. The aim is to kill enemies and upgrade your character in order to become stronger and stronger.

In Future War you can find collectibles throughout each stage, then visit the upgrade shop in order to purchase health, armour, stamina and melee upgrades.

This is an old University Game Engine project and as such it will not be receiving any updates currently but may be looked back into in the future.
